entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, who has been ill and unconscious. He is being taken care of by Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's who has been taking care of him while he was ill and unconscious.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone whose curses Harry may have screamed like

entities.name: the baby in the crib
entities.description: A baby in a crib is mentioned as an example of something that might cry

relationships.description: Hermione has been taking care of Harry while he was ill and unconscious.
